channel.title: UrbanRanch on SoCal Ranch - a (sub)urban ranching experiment in organic and digital life
channel.description: Recent content in UrbanRanch on SoCal Ranch - a (sub)urban ranching experiment in organic and digital life

item.title: Ranch Life
item.description: Even if its just a suburban ranch its still full of life and lessons and hard work. Surviving is more than just showing up. Thriving is more than waiting for nice pleasant things to show up.  Having a plan. Sticking to it and chipping away at the mou Taib of work are two keys to fulfilling a dream come true on the urban ranch.
